issues.description: This site does not provide OCSP stapling, a mechanism that prevents clients from having to contact the CA each time the revocation status of the certificate needs to be verified.
issues.impact_details: By forcing clients to contact the CA to retrieve the revocation details of the certificate, the site is compromising their privacy, since every visit to the site is reported to the CA.
